metadata.title: CVE-2021-44647 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Lua v5.4.3 and above are affected by SEGV by type confusion infuncnamefromcode function in ldebug.c which can cause a local denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: lua50: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
